biotools.summary: EXTRACT identifies genes/proteins, chemical compounds, organisms, environments, tissues, diseases, phenotypes and Gene Ontology terms mentioned in a given piece of text and maps them to their corresponding ontology/taxonomy entries.

bioschemas.name: EXTRACT
bioschemas.summary: EXTRACT identifies genes/proteins, chemical compounds, organisms, environments, tissues, diseases, phenotypes and Gene Ontology terms mentioned in a given piece of text and maps them to their corresponding ontology/taxonomy entries.
